title: Process a Customer Referral Bonus
description: An existing customer referred a new customer who has just signed up. The existing customer is now owed a referral bonus.

tasks.description: Verify the new customer signed up using the existing customer's unique referral code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the referral link was used.

tasks.description: Verify that the new customer has made their first payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the condition for the bonus has been met.

tasks.description: Apply the referral bonus (e.g., a one-month service credit) to the existing customer's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: The referring customer receives their bonus.
